summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to low-income housing, approving the 1996-98 Administrative and Financial Plan for 1995 Housing Levy Programs established under Ordinance 117711, directing the Department of Housing and Human Services to submit a status report to the City Council on the administration of Housing Levy funds, and authorizing expenditure of certain funds allocated to the administration of Housing Levy programs, subject to appropriation.
committee: Housing, Housing, Human Services Education and Libraries
